column5: I just got word that the Bowmanville store has 2 power augers in stock.  Sorry I didn't ask about the tent.   Quote from the GM.  I have 78-8328 for $262.49 which is half price.  2 of them.  Sale ends next Friday.
I just saw the flyer but do they have anything buy ice fishing equipment on sale?

Power auger at the Leslie & Lakeshore and Markham and Lawrence location. Markham and Lawrence also had a couple Frabill huts at $250 (as of late this afternoon). A sale of odds and ends with a number of ice fishing items but certainly not an ice fishing clearance.  Sale is on for TWO weeks not one as reported previously.  Good luck in getting what you seek.
Here's the link to the fishing clearance items. Even have the ABU 6500C3 on half price.  http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/subcateg...408474396675848

Gunnison Float Tube is also half price $75 if you look in the sports section of the clearance sale section.  Lot of PFD's on sale... ratchet straps for boat transom (the kind that mount to trailer permanantly...GERRITT !)
Thanks for the link Irish, I may get a new rod combo.
thanks IRISH ,gonna grab an auger in the mornin',, if ones still around that is.    put new blades on the hand auger this year  and they're working very well but power stuff is more fun.

I picked up one of the 2 man frabill trekker portable huts. Great deal. Thanks to OFNrs for highlighting the sale. There was one jiffy auger left at the Lansdowne ptbo location at 3:00 pm Friday. I had to summon all my will power not to take it home too.
Yup the Garmin GPSMAP 76 is on sale fo 197.99 too for anyone looking! Wish they had the colour one, dang
sweeeeet deal on hut and auger
Go figure I just went on a crazy spending spree on Ebay a couple of days ago  .Oh well I guess you cant have to many rods or to much tackle so I am heading over this morning to check out the sale.
wow there are some great deals in this flyer this week!  Cheers!

Thanks guys for the heads-up......grabbed the Jiffy auger....$297.00 tax's in!! Incredible deal.  Bowmanville and South Oshawa stores are sold-out.  There was 2 left in Whitby as of 8:30 last night.  Jason
I Grabbed myself the C3, had no plans to do so but I "needed it" cost was 74.99 , half price from $149.99 Good deal, I think

When I was at the big CTC in Kingston this morning around 1045, the young guy told the Fishing Dept Mgr, that the fish-huts were gone....  The Mgr. told me that they had sold seven power augers since 0900 - they were walking out the place.  What a sale - I guess.  David  aka Superdad
The GPS is not such a great deal. But I did buy 3 pairs of vise grips today at 30% off.
Hey, thats probably work related stuff(not that there's anything wrong with that), not ice fi..................oh, forgot, you don't ice fish any more. Still, thats a good score Dan.
